query.sfwSql: select * from sgs_cor_tracking a inner join sgs_cor_templates b on a.template_id = b.template_id where (cor_status_value = 'GENR' AND datediff(hh,GENERATED_DATE,getDate()) > 168)
select * from sgs_cor_tracking a inner join sgs_cor_templates b on a.template_id = b.template_id where tracking_id = @trackingId
select * from sgs_cor_tracking a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgs_cor_templates b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.template_id = b.template_id where a.cor_status_value = 'REIM' AND a.CONVERTED_TO_IMAGE_FLAG = 'Y'

select * from sgs_cor_tracking a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgs_cor_templates b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.template_id = b.template_id where a.cor_status_value = 'REIM' AND (a.CONVERTED_TO_IMAGE_FLAG IS NULL OR a.CONVERTED_TO_IMAGE_FLAG <> 'Y')

select sp.MPI_PERSON_ID as istrMpiPersonID ,sp.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + sp.LAST_NAME as istrFullName, sct.*,sctemp.* from SGS_COR_TRACKING as sct join SGS_COR_TEMPLATES as sctemp on sctemp.TEMPLATE_ID=sct.TEMPLATE_ID join SGT_PERSON SP on SP.PERSON_ID = sct.PERSON_ID

SELECT SP.MPI_PERSON_ID AS ISTRMPIPERSONID ,SP.LAST_NAME+ ',' + SP.FIRST_NAME AS ISTRFULLNAME,SCT.*,SCTEMP.* ,PT.*,(SU.FIRST_NAME +' '+ SU.LAST_NAME)ANALYSTNAME,SU.USER_SERIAL_ID AS ANALYST_ID, CASE WHEN PT.ACCESS_TEMPLATE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ACCESS_PACKET_FLAG FROM SGS_COR_TRACKING AS SCT JOIN SGS_COR_TEMPLATES AS SCTEMP ON SCTEMP.TEMPLATE_ID=SCT.TEMPLATE_ID JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SP.PERSON_ID = SCT.PERSON_ID JOIN SGS_COR_PACKET_CONTENT_TRACKING PT ON SCT.TRACKING_ID = PT.TRACKING_ID --LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON SP.ANALYST_ID = SU.USER_SERIAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_USER SU ON SU.USER_SERIAL_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 ANALYST_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_CASE_ANALYST WHERE PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC) WHERE ISNULL(SCTEMP.TRACK_DETAILS_FLAG,'N') = 'Y'

/* This 30 day eligibility report is associated with the 30 Day Retire Health Eligibility Report Batch batch job */
--Get the first day of next month DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE AS DATETIME SET @PAYMENTDATE = DATEADD(m, DATEDIFF(m, -1, current_timestamp), 0)
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb.dbo.#TEMP_SAVE', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TEMP_SAVE;
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_SAVE ( RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE DATETIME, MPI_PERSON_ID VARCHAR(20), PERSON_ID INT, SSN VARCHAR(256), LAST_NAME VARCHAR(50), FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(35), [Address] VARCHAR(200), DATE_OF_BIRTH DATETIME, RETIREMENT_DATE DATETIME, SSADATE DATETIME, PAYMENTDATE DATETIME, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY VARCHAR(10), MPIPERSONID VARCHAR(20), LASTNAME VARCHAR(50), FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(50), ADDR_LINE_1 VARCHAR(60), ADDR_LINE_2 VARCHAR(60), ADDR_CITY VARCHAR(50), ADDR_STATE_VALUE VARCHAR(4), ADDR_ZIP_CODE VARCHAR(5), )
--This is the query that Michael Centeno requested we use to determine who is eligible 30 days beforehand. --It's basically the PENDING RETIREMENT STATUS LOOKUP REPORT (with filters) INSERT INTO #TEMP_SAVE (RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE, MPI_PERSON_ID, PERSON_ID, SSN, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, [Address], DATE_OF_BIRTH, RETIREMENT_DATE, SSADATE, PAYMENTDATE, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY, MPIPERSONID, LASTNAME, FIRSTNAME, ADDR_LINE_1, ADDR_LINE_2, ADDR_CITY, ADDR_STATE_VALUE, ADDR_ZIP_CODE) SELECT DISTINCT SP.RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE ,SP.MPI_PERSON_ID+' '+right(SP.SSN,4) AS MPI_PERSON_ID ,SP.PERSON_ID , SP.SSN , SP.LAST_NAME , SP.FIRST_NAME , SPADD.ADDR_LINE_1 +' ' + ISNULL(SPADD.ADDR_LINE_2,'') +' '+ SPADD.ADDR_CITY+' '+ SPADD.ADDR_STATE_VALUE+' '+SPADD.ADDR_ZIP_CODE AS Address , SP.DATE_OF_BIRTH ,CPCT.RETIREMENT_DATE ,ISNULL(null,null) AS SSADATE , @PAYMENTDATE AS PAYMENTDATE , CASE WHEN (SP.RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE IS NOT NULL OR SP.RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE <> '') THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY ,SP.MPI_PERSON_ID AS MPIPERSONID ,SP.LAST_NAME AS LASTNAME ,SP.FIRST_NAME AS FIRSTNAME ,SPADD.ADDR_LINE_1 ,ISNULL(SPADD.ADDR_LINE_2,'') as ADDR_LINE_2 ,SPADD.ADDR_CITY ,SPADD.ADDR_STATE_VALUE ,SPADD.ADDR_ZIP_CODE FROM [OPUS].[dbo].[SGS_COR_TRACKING] CT INNER JOIN SGS_COR_PACKET_CONTENT_TRACKING CPCT ON CT.TRACKING_ID=CPCT.TRACKING_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON CT.PERSON_ID =SP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS SPADD ON SP.PERSON_ID = SPADD.PERSON_ID AND SPADD.END_DATE IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_COR_PACKET_CONTENT CPC ON CPCT.COR_PACKET_CONTENT_ID = CPC.COR_PACKET_CONTENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_COR_TEMPLATES CTPL ON CT.TEMPLATE_ID =CTPL.TEMPLATE_ID AND CTPL.TEMPLATE_TYPE_VALUE = 'PCKT' WHERE CPCT.RETIREMENT_DATE BETWEEN @PAYMENTDATE and @PAYMENTDATE AND ISNULL(SP.HEALTH_ELIGIBLE_FLAG,'N') <> 'N' --Additional condition Michael requested that's not in the PENDING RETIREMENT STATUS LOOKUP REPORT AND @PAYMENTDATE = CASE --If Retiree Health Effective Date field is populated and is prior to current payment date - then remove from list. If the Retiree Health Date field is = to current payment date then add to list WHEN SP.RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN SP.RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE ELSE @PAYMENTDATE END AND CPCT.PACKET_STATUS_VALUE IN ('CMPL','RECV') --Request #116443 on 9/2/2021 by Michael C. to add 'Received' to the filter AND CTPL.TEMPLATE_DESC IN ('Retirement Application Packet - MPI','Retirement Application Packet - Locals 52-600-666-700','Retiree Health Packet')
--If it's the first time running the report for this @PAYMENTDATE, then insert the records into table TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY WHERE PAYMENTDATE = @PAYMENTDATE) BEGIN INSERT INTO TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID, MPIPERSONID, PERSON_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, [DATE_OF_BIRTH], [Address], [UNIONCODE] = Pillars.dbo.[fn_GetTrueUnionBy_SSN_N_Date_OldWay_OPUS] ( SSN, DATEADD(YEAR, -1, @PAYMENTDATE), @PAYMENTDATE ), [RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY], [ADDR_LINE_1], [ADDR_LINE_2], [ADDR_CITY], [ADDR_STATE_VALUE], [ADDR_ZIP_CODE], RETIREMENT_DATE, SSADATE, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE, @PAYMENTDATE, 'OPUS Batch', GETDATE(), 'OPUS Batch', GETDATE(), NULL, NULL, 0 FROM #TEMP_SAVE END
ELSE
BEGIN DECLARE @THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK BIT SET @THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK = 0 SELECT TOP 1 @THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK = THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK FROM TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY WHERE PAYMENTDATE = @PAYMENTDATE
--Only add/update records in the TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY table (for the PAYMENTDATE) when @THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK is FALSE. Otherwise additions/edits are locked. --FYI: THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK flips true (1) when the RETIREE HEALTH ELIGIBILITY REPORT runs. IF @THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK = 0 BEGIN --If any CANCELLATIONS, Update the LATE_CANCELLATION_DATE value UPDATE TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY SET LATE_CANCELLATION_DATE = GETDATE(), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MPI_PERSON_ID IN ( SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID FROM TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY WHERE (PAYMENTDATE = @PAYMENTDATE AND LATE_CANCELLATION_DATE IS NULL) EXCEPT SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID FROM #TEMP_SAVE )
--If any ADDITIONS, Insert record(s) and set the LATE_ADDITION_DATE value INSERT INTO TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID, MPIPERSONID, PERSON_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, [DATE_OF_BIRTH], [Address], [UNIONCODE] = Pillars.dbo.[fn_GetTrueUnionBy_SSN_N_Date_OldWay_OPUS] ( SSN, DATEADD(YEAR, -1, @PAYMENTDATE), @PAYMENTDATE ), [RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY], [ADDR_LINE_1], [ADDR_LINE_2], [ADDR_CITY], [ADDR_STATE_VALUE], [ADDR_ZIP_CODE], RETIREMENT_DATE, SSADATE, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE, @PAYMENTDATE, 'OPUS Batch', GETDATE(), 'OPUS Batch', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), NULL, 0 FROM #TEMP_SAVE WHERE MPI_PERSON_ID IN ( SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID FROM #TEMP_SAVE EXCEPT SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID FROM TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY WHERE PAYMENTDATE = @PAYMENTDATE ) END END
--Return report results SELECT MPI_PERSON_ID, PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME + ' '+ FIRST_NAME AS [NAME], [Address], DATE_OF_BIRTH, RETIREMENT_DATE, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_DATE, SSADATE, PAYMENTDATE, UNIONCODE, RETIREMENT_HEALTH_ONLY, MPIPERSONID, LAST_NAME AS LASTNAME, FIRST_NAME AS FIRSTNAME, ADDR_LINE_1, ADDR_LINE_2, ADDR_CITY, ADDR_STATE_VALUE, ADDR_ZIP_CODE, LATE_ADDITION_DATE, LATE_CANCELLATION_DATE, THIRTY_DAY_REPORT_LOCK FROM TEMP_30_DAY_HEALTH_ELIGIBILITY WHERE PAYMENTDATE = @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY LASTNAME, FIRSTNAME
DROP TABLE #TEMP_SAVE

select sp.MPI_PERSON_ID as istrMpiPersonID ,sp.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + sp.LAST_NAME as istrFullName, sct.*,sctemp.* from SGS_COR_TRACKING as sct join SGS_COR_TEMPLATES as sctemp on sctemp.TEMPLATE_ID=sct.TEMPLATE_ID join SGT_PERSON SP on SP.PERSON_ID = sct.PERSON_ID left outer join SGT_RTW_CORR_MAPPING as rcm ON rcm.CORR_TRACKING_ID = sct.TRACKING_ID where SP.PERSON_ID=@PersonID AND rcm.REEMPLOYMENT_NOTIFICATION_ID = @ReemploymentNotificationId
